Title: MC4.3-optically coupled mode-locked laser array for spectroscopy in inp generic integration
Source: IEEE Photonics Soc. Summer Top. Meet. Ser., SUM
Abstract: © 2019 IEEE.We propose a two-element mode-locked laser array operating at 1.56 μm. Optical pulses with 14.5-ps width, spectral bandwidth exceeding 7 nm, and RF line width of 260 kHz at 12.448 GHz are experimentally reported.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
